actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A resolution relating to the acquisition of a statue commemorating United States servicemen who served in the Vietnam war.

summary.text: Declares that, in order to honor appropriately United States servicemen who served in the Vietnam war, the Committee on Veterans' Affairs is authorized and directed to procure by purchase, gift, or otherwise a suitable statue and to cause such statue to be placed in the Russell Office Building.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the acquisition of a statue commemorating United States servicemen who served in the Vietnam war.
